text.body: His biography on National Basketball Association NBA website states By acclamation Michael Jordan greatest basketball player all time Jordan one most effectively marketed athletes his generation considered instrumental popularizing NBA around world s s
After three season career at University North Carolina at Chapel Hill where he member Tar Heels national championship team Jordan joined NBA s Chicago Bulls
He also gained reputation being one best defensive players basketball he won his first NBA championship Bulls followed achievement titles securing three peat

Although Jordan abruptly retired basketball before beginning NBA season to pursue career baseball he rejoined Bulls led them to three additional championships as well as NBA record regular season wins NBA season

Jordan s second season cut short by broken foot third game season caused him to miss games Despite Jordan s injury record at time fifth worst record any team to qualify playoffs NBA history Bulls made playoffs

Jordan recovered time to participate playoffs performed well upon his return Against Boston Celtics team often considered one greatest NBA history Jordan set still unbroken record points playoff game Game Celtics however managed to sweep series

In season Jordan again led league scoring averaging ppg on shooting field along rpg assists per game apg Bulls finished record advanced to Eastern Conference Finals defeating Cavaliers New York Knicks along way
The Bulls entered season as team on rise their core group Jordan young improving players like Scottie Pippen Horace Grant under guidance new coach Phil Jackson
In season Jordan won his second MVP award after averaging ppg on shooting rpg apg regular season Bulls finished first place their division first time years set franchise record wins regular season
With Scottie Pippen developing into All Star Bulls elevated their play Bulls defeated New York Knicks Philadelphia ers opening two rounds playoffs
The Bulls advanced to NBA Finals first time franchise history to face Magic Johnson James Worthy beat Los Angeles Lakers four games to one compiling outstanding playoff record along way
During Bulls playoff run controversy arose when Jordan seen gambling Atlantic City New Jersey night before game against New York Knicks

Jordan left college after his junior year to join NBA Drafted by Chicago Bulls he soon proved himself on court He helped team make to playoffs scored average points per game season his efforts Jordan received NBA Rookie Year Award selected All Star Game

In he finished his bachelor s degree geography continued to play basketball professionally While his second season marred by injury Jordan breaking new ground on court during season He became first player since Wilt Chamberlin to score more than points single season

By late s Chicago Bulls quickly becoming force to be reckoned Jordan instrumental part team s success Bulls made to Eastern Conference Finals won their first NBA championship following year by defeating Los Angeles Lakers

In Chicago Bulls beat Portland Trail Blazers to win their second NBA championship title team took their third championship following year dominating basketball world Jordan however other things on his mind

Although summary his basketball career influence on game inevitably fails to do justice as phenomenal athlete unique combination fundamental soundness grace speed power artistry improvisational ability unquenchable competitive desire Jordan single handedly redefined NBA superstar

Even contemporaneous superstars recognized unparalleled position Jordan Magic Johnson There s Michael Jordan then there rest us Larry Bird following playoff game where Jordan dropped points on Boston Celtics just his second season appraisal young player God disguised as Michael Jordan

A brief listing his top accomplishments include following Rookie Year Five time NBA MVP Six time NBA champion Six time NBA Finals MVP Ten time All NBA First Team Nine time NBA All Defensive First Team Defensive Player Year time NBA All Star Three time NBA All Star MVP th Anniversary All Time Team Ten scoring titles
Starting season he began career long onslaught on NBA record book year saw him average points first seven consecutive seasons he led league scoring topped points per contest
